original_title: soft demo of Optical De-dramatization Engine (O.D.E.) applied in 15 hour cycles to Ma-Xu Weibang's... Song at Midnight'.
overview: In her “Optical De-dramatization Engine (O.D.E.) applied in 15-hour cycles to Ma-Xu Weibang’s Yeban gesheng (Song at Midnight), 1937″ (2009), her software generates a data composition from rendered images of a Shangai version of Phantom of the Opera (1937) to music by Ma-Xu Weibang (Song at Midnight).
title: soft demo of Optical De-dramatization Engine (O.D.E.) applied in 15 hour cycles to Ma-Xu Weibang's... Song at Midnight'.
